Title: The Great Water
Writer: Zhivko Chingo (novel), Ivo Trajkov, Vladimir Blazevski, Zivko Cingo (novel)
Actors: Saso Kekenovski, Maja Stankovska, Mitko Apostolovski, Verica Nedeska
Plot: An ailing communist reflects on his childhood in Stalinist Yugoslavia.
Country: Republic of Macedonia, Czech Republic, USA, Germany
